mapper.sql: apiId, type, tableId, api, guid, paramNum, apiJson, sqlQuery, userId, createTime, apiName, blockTime, prop,limitTop
mapper.insert: insert into userapi (apiId, type, tableId, api, guid, paramNum, apiJson, sqlQuery, userId, createTime, apiName, blockTime, prop) values (#{apiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{api,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{apijson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlquery,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{apiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blocktime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prop,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update userapi
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tableId = #{tableid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
api = #{api,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paramNum = #{paramnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apiJson = #{apijson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sqlQuery = #{sqlquery,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apiName = #{apiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blockTime = #{blocktime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prop = #{prop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limitTop=#{limitTop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where apiId = #{apiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update userapi set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tableId = #{tableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, api = #{api,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paramNum = #{paramnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apiJson = #{apijson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sqlQuery = #{sqlquery,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apiName = #{apiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blockTime = #{blocktime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prop = #{prop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where apiId = #{apiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT api.ApiID,ut.TableName,api.APIName,api.Type,api.Guid,api.CreateTime FROM UserAPI AS api INNER JOIN UserTable AS ut ON api.TableID=ut.TableID WHERE ut.tableid=#{tableId} AND ut.Deleted!=1
SELECT api.*,ut.TableName FROM UserAPI AS api INNER JOIN UserTable AS ut ON api.TableID=ut.TableID WHERE api.userId=#{userId} AND ut.Deleted!=1

select ua.*,cp.cloudid,cp.cloudname,ut.tableName,ua.limitTop from userapi as ua inner join usertable as ut on ua.tableId=ut.tableId inner join cloudprojects as cp on cp.cloudId=ut.cloudId where ua.guid=#{guid} and cp.cuid=#{cuId} and ut.deleted=0
